API_KEY.description: The API Key of the Client for authentication towards the server. required for sending mails.

REQUEST_TIMEOUT_MS.description: API handler request timeout in milliseconds

GLOBAL_LOGIN_ANNOUNCEMENT.description: global announcement, shown as notification in header on startpage when not loggedin.

GLOBAL_ANNOUNCEMENT.description: global announcement, shown as notification in header on startpage

LOGIN_BLOCKED_COOKIES_NOTE.default: Bitte aktiviere Cookies für diese Seite. Andernfalls ist ein Login aus technischen Gründen nicht möglich.
LOGIN_BLOCKED_COOKIES_NOTE.description: text that is shown above the login form if cookies are blocked by the browser.

FEATURE_CSRF_ENABLED.description: Enables CSRF Token generation and error handler in app.

FEATURE_MORGAN_LOG_ENABLED.description: If enabled, morgan logs are written.

MORGAN_LOG_FORMAT.description: Sets the morgan log level. Morgan is creating access logs for express.

LOG_LEVEL.description: Sets the winston log level. Winston is used for all logs. @see AbstractConfigSetLevels

TEACHER_VISIBILITY_FOR_EXTERNAL_TEAM_INV.description: Defines wether external team invitation shows teachers from different schools or not. if enabled system wide there are options general enabled or opt-in/-out by user required.

STUDENT_TEAM_CREATION.description: defines wether students may create teams or not. if enabled system wide there are options general enabled or opt-in/-out by school admin required.

FEATURE_VIDEOCONFERENCE_ENABLED.description: If enabled, adds video conferences to teams and courses.

NOT_AUTHENTICATED_REDIRECT_URL.description: The URL to authenticate. Unauthenticated users are redirected to this URL with ?redirect= pointing to the original request URL

FEATURE_JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_ENABLED.description: Using privateDevice parameter in login, the logout/jwt timeout can be extended to JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_SECONDS instead of JWT_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.

SC_CONTACT_EMAIL.description: Contact E-Mail Adress to The HPI School-Cloud team.

FEATURE_MATRIX_MESSENGER_ENABLED.description: If enabled, adds support for matrix messenger

MATRIX_MESSENGER_BUNDLE.description: Where to find the messenger dependencies.

FEATURE_MESSENGER_SCHOOL_ROOM_ENABLED.description: If enabled, school admins can choose to create a room for all students and teachers of the school

FEATURE_ALERTS_ENABLED.description: If enabled, user will see messages/incidents from e.g status.schul-cloud

GHOST_API_KEY.description: Content API Key of ghost blog

GHOST_API_URL.description: Content API URL of ghost blog (should end without a slash)

COOKIE.description: Cookie properties, required always to be defined
